physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It does not have a frame and its sides are whitened out. A man in uniforms can be seen on the right hand side of the image. He is using a long metal tool and is bending to the left and applying some force to it. A large portion of the photograph is taken up by the head of a locomotive. It is stationed at a railway turntable. The number \\6423\\ is displayed at the front of the locomotive
subject_terms_1:slightly above the middle point of the photograph. The initials of the Malaysia rail operator railroads (infrastructure) blue collar workers turntables (rail transportation structure) trains (vehicle groupings)
subject_terms_2:\\KTM\\ Locomotives Railroads Blue collar workers Turntables (Railroads) Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Tanjong Pagar (Singapore) Railroad trains
subject_terms_3:is displayed on top of the front door of the locomotive as well.\ Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Photography
